model.paint

Class ShapePaintStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.paint.APaintStrategy
      • model.paint.ShapePaintStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPaintStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EllipsePaintStrategy, PolygonPaintStrategy, RectanglePaintStrategy, UprightShapePaintStrategy

    public class ShapePaintStrategy
extends APaintStrategy
    Concrete class that defines invariant painting behaviors to paint Shape objects for all its subclasses. Note: This cannot be directly instantiated by the BallWorld system because it lacks a no-parameter constructor.
    Author:
    Suozhi Qi, Zhou Liu
